vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
εὐχᾰριστ-έω,
bestow a favour on, oblige, τῷ δήμῳ τῷ Δηλίων [Refs 3rd c.BC+]; τινι [Refs 3rd c.BC+]
__2 to be thankful, return thanks, Decrees cited in [Refs 4th c.BC+]; τοῖς Αθηναίοις [Refs 2nd c.BC+]; ἐπί τινι or περί τινος for a thing, [Refs 2nd c.BC+]; especially to the gods, ἐπὶ τῷ ἐρρῶσθαί σε τοῖς θεοῖς εὐ. [NT+2nd c.BC+]:—passive, to be thanked, ηὐχαρίστηται κεραυνοῖς [Refs 5th c.BC+]; to be received with thanks, [NT]
__3 pray, τῷ θεῷ περί τινος [Refs 4th c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to thank, give thanks, render gratitude; this can mean words that express gratitude or the emotion of gratitude
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to thank, give thanks, render gratitude; this can mean words that express gratitude or the emotion of gratitude
to thank, Lk. 17:16; absolute to give thanks, Mt. 15:36; 26:27; passive to be made a matter of thankfulness, 2Cor. 1:11
